review: The Gasparilla Festival of the Arts is a fantastic event that truly showcases the vibrant art scene in Tampa. The variety of art on display, from paintings to sculptures, is impressive, and the atmosphere is lively and welcoming. While the festival is family-friendly, it also caters to art enthusiasts like myself who appreciate the finer details. I particularly enjoyed the live demonstrations and the opportunity to interact with the artists. A must-visit for anyone who loves art!
